rules.description: Show kindness and respect to everyone, avoiding any form of harassment, bullying, or discrimination.
Avoid using any racist, sexist, homophobic, or offensive language.

rules.rule: No doxing or sharing personal information.
rules.description: Keep private information private and avoid sharing details about yourself or others.

rules.rule: No cheating or using unauthorised modifications.
rules.description: Refrain from using hacks, cheats, or mods that provide an unfair advantage.
Report any bugs, glitches, or exploits to the staff and avoid using them for personal gain.
Adhere to directions given by server staff to maintain a fair and fun environment.

rules.rule: No use of real-life currency for in-game trading.
rules.description: Avoid trading in-game items for real-life money; doing so will result in a ban for both parties involved.
Refrain from using alternate accounts to gain an unfair advantage or disrupt gameplay.
Avoid flooding the chat with unnecessary messages, symbols, or repeated content.
Refrain from promoting other servers, services, or products in any form.
Ensure your usernames, skins, and profile pictures are appropriate and do not contain offensive content.
Engage in fair play and avoid behaviour that ruins the experience for others.
